body:
Comment 3: 
It is true that relative links don't really make sense in the source code comments. I
think your suggestion to treat links to "golang.org" might be a pragmatic solution to
the problem. It would make the local godoc server work even better in offline mode.

Really, this is one of the truly awesome features of godoc. I've often been surprised
that I have been working offline without knowing it, since godoc provides a lot of the
information I need without even requiring access to the Internet.
